meanings.definition: A unit of electric current equal to one millionth of an ampere.
meanings.sent1: I measured the tiny current in the circuit using a microampere.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device consumes only a microampere of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally got a shock from a microampere of current.
meanings.sent4: In the vast sea of electricity, a microampere is like a single drop.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained the concept of a microampere with a simple analogy.
